title: FirmWars
author: FirmWars
content: I know you click on this topic because of the title, the same way those idiots takes advantage of you on Youtube and Twitter, saying they know which projects are best for you. Here is a fact for people like you.If you accept this fact early on, then you will have a more successful journey in the crypto space.You can't just have someone message you with an idea that can change your life, why don't they take advantage of it and get rich first?They want to use you and it's let for you to use your head. I don't see rich people willingly going around telling people how to get rich either, they won't. Let's stop fooling ourselves, everyone is running after something.Be smart because this crypto space is like a wild west, you are on your own, and the only way to find your way is believing in yourself and the knowledge you are acquiring on this forum. Nothing comes without a price, work your way up, if everyone has the poor antidote everyone will be rich, including all your neighbors and friends. It's not easy to get rich and that's why people are taking advantage of people. Work your way UP.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: That's the reality, these rich people don't have much time to chit-chat and look for a random person on the web telling them that they know the way to riches. If someone approaches you out of nowhere and tries to make you believe that they can make you rich, it's the opposite way around. You'll be the one that shall add to their riches because they'll fool you with whatever instruction that they're going to give you on what and where you should invest on this market.

comments.author: Aikidoka
comments.body: I totally agree with that. Nothing worthwhile comes easily. If you don't put in hard work and come up with your own original ideas, success will be hard to get. It's true that you might get paid for working under someone or simply copying and pasting things you find elsewhere but you'll find yourself wasting alot of time for just a few bucks. Meanwhile, the website owner or the person who brought you into this business will be making thousands of dollars. That's just the difference.So as OP said, everyone should work their way up. Instead of wasting time on useless websites trying to earn pennies it's better to invest your time in learning things that will help you reach higher positions in the future.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: If it's easy to get rich quickly all of us here should already be rich but actually, it's not easy. This term "get rich quick scheme" you usually heard it in any scam investment you better avoid such thing if you want to get rich you should be hardworking I believe on "Laziness is a secret ingredient that goes into failure".You won't be able to get rich without hard work and knowledge.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: QuoteCome and let me teach you how to get rich quick Dear OP, your title and your content contradicts each other and it's quite misleading. By the caption I thought you have some information or insights to share with the forum members that can be really beneficiary but your content is more of a motivational post and not what I thought I would find. Being rich or super rich is not by mere motivational speech, it also requires some level of risk and hardwork.

comments.author: Iroh
comments.body: Your topic head certainly did attract me and I decided to click. I thought the OP was among the mischievous lot who try to squeeze out money from unsuspecting/ignorant individuals using numerous means. I was curious to read and perhaps laugh at whatever method you would recommend on how someone could get rich overnight. You just cannot get rich overnight, unless you happen to come across a gazillion dollars that has no owner lol. Why would you believe someone you barely know claiming to know of a so called investment or business that would triple your capital in a short while. I think this all boils down to doing ones research and not having to readily believe whatever anyone tells you without having some doubt about its validity. You canâ€™t get anywhere in this life without hard work and being consistent in your endeavors.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Nothing here teaches other members to get rich, members here teach other users about Bitcoin/Crypto in general and several other processing methods, so that users do not go astray and understand the uses or risks in the crypto world itself, different understandings of investment and trading are carried out by the users themselves, successful or not doing those two things whether they are rich or not, that's what they themselves know, there's no need to show it here.Quote from: FirmWars on May 26, 2023, 12:33:37 PMWork your way UP. Remember whatever you want to do, if you don't have a teacher or guide for the action you want to do, of course the certainty of destruction will be with you, here you get knowledge that cannot be valued in money, especially about crypto/Bitcoin, rich or poor is destiny, no matter how great you are, if you are destined to be poor you will remain poor, bottom line: advice, knowledge, suggestions, ideas and everything that is obtained here is not to determine someone to be rich, judging someone's success and the knowledge given is not from the wealth that gives that knowledge.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on May 26, 2023, 12:33:37 PMI know you click on this topic because of the title, the same way those idiots takes advantage of you on Youtube and Twitter, saying they know which projects are best for you. So true. I came here because of the title, but instead of being interested in the offer written in the title, I came here to clarify the contents of the title. There is no specific formula that can guarantee someone to get rich quickly after going through the points taught step by step. Something of value will never be obtained easily, to become rich must go through a long process.It's the same with crypto assets, you have to go through a process that takes quite a long time to become a reliable investor, but there is no guarantee that you will always be successful in investing. Everyone wants to be rich, but wealth will not come to everyone, so until now there are still poor people around us.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on May 26, 2023, 12:33:37 PMI know you click on this topic because of the title, the same way those idiots takes advantage of you on Youtube and Twitter, saying they know which projects are best for you. Well OP, nah. I didn't really click the link because of the title, but I was curious to see how would others react to this since I knew already in the first place that this is just a clickbait otherwise this thread could have been trashed already in less than 12 hours. These kinds of "kindness scam" are also common in FB if you would ask me. I was browsing a lot of crypto news lately there and saw a lot of dummy accounts claiming that they can help you earn $40/day which is kinda high here in my country since I live in a third-world country. Truth is nobody will ever tell you how to get rich let alone even earning money easily. You just got to get our asses out there and grind the fuck out of there.In crypto, it's a whole lotta worse considering how many investments could be made in here and you never know which one will take your money away or which one will give that juicy 2x to you.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Getting rich depends on one's sincerity in working and working for it. If they try hard and always look for what they want, they will surely become rich one day. Rich people don't share all the recipes for getting rich but only provide an outline and let us develop it according to our abilities and expertise. And we can't depend on them to get rich instead, we need to work hard and remember everything takes time. So it's better to enjoy the process and don't think about when this will be achieved because, by the time you achieve it, you won't notice it. Everything will happen slowly, and you will become rich later. But isn't health a priceless wealth?

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on May 26, 2023, 12:33:37 PMI know you click on this topic because of the title, the same way those idiots takes advantage of you on Youtube and Twitter, saying they know which projects are best for you. This was not my reason for clicking on this post. I did that because I was surprised that we have such people around here. I was anticipating joining other members to give the OP the needed advice. I have never been moved by get-rich-quick enterprise and it has helped me to stay safe from scammers. Nobody will give you wealth just like that because everybody needs more money. Days are gone when people were given Bitcoin freely with little or no effort. Any investment that promises to make you rich fast without effort is likely a scam. Hard work, determination, and sacrifice are key virtues that will lead to durable riches. If the scheme promises to give you a high profit, just be careful and do your own research.

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: Quote from: sokani on May 26, 2023, 01:31:47 PMQuoteCome and let me teach you how to get rich quick Dear OP, your title and your content contradicts each other and it's quite misleading. By the caption I thought you have some information or insights to share with the forum members that can be really beneficiary but your content is more of a motivational post and not what I thought I would find. Being rich or super rich is not by mere motivational speech, it also requires some level of risk and hardwork.I guess OP's magic worked on you, the reason he used that title was to make sure people check the topic out and you did Â   It's true that nobody will be willing to tell you how they make money, if they do trust me, their ways are not clean, those that teach people how to make money in my country are always into illegal things like romance scam or hacking. If your hustle is right and clean it will be hard to sit someone down and offload all you know into their heads unless their are your children. Those who works for real must have thought about how much they suffered trying to make money, they will surely want someone else to pass through the hard journey too.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on May 26, 2023, 12:33:37 PMI know you click on this topic because of the titleNo I didn't because of the title but I did to tell you that I disagree with whatever you have to say to make people believe your easy way out to riches because there's nothing like that. Therefore Like your post is saying, I have to add there is no easy way to glory. Jesus Christ was crucified before his glory and that is how it is with life. If things become easy, you have to be careful with it. Don't be deceived to send money to people asking for subscription.

comments.author: collinscoinz
comments.body: In deed what if the person you wanna teach how to get rich dose not know how to control resources,By the caption I think you have some information or insights to share with the forum members that can be really beneficiary but your content is more of a motivational post and not what I thought I would find. Being rich or super rich is not by mere motivational speech, it also requires some level of risk and hardwork.Getting rich depends on one's sincerity in working and working realy hard for it. If they try hard and always look for what they want, they will surely become rich one day. Rich people don't share all the secrete for getting rich but only provide a channel.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: On the contrary, successful people are always willing to teach, but you'll have to ask them first. That's the difference with those that hit up people on telegram or other social media platforms claiming that their ebook contains a trick that'll teach people how to make 1k dollars a week. In a sense the ebook is the trick, nothing to learn in there. Intelligent people would ask why they are selling the cow, the seller already cooked up a delicious response for questions like that writing the book. However, some successful people have the time to teach people in their niche to learn how they could climb. Especially in a social media era where top players in every industry has a platform where they publish free tips for their followers. In a way, no knowledge is a waste.

comments.author: macson
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on May 26, 2023, 12:33:37 PMsnipI don't see rich people willingly going around telling people how to get rich either, they won't. Let's stop fooling ourselves, everyone is running after something.Nothing comes without a price, work your way up, if everyone has the poor antidote everyone will be rich, including all your neighbors and friends. It's not easy to get rich and that's why people are taking advantage of people. Work your way UP. Exactly, what's the benefit of the rich spitting their recipe for getting rich when they need poor people to exist to make their (existence) as rich people acknowledged!influencers on YouTube need an audience or viewers to be able to continue to make their accounts get paid from Adsense, so their goal to make videos full of clickbait (like the OP title) it's clearly read.being rich is not an easy matter, everyone who is born into this world will not be rich equally, so be rich with the results of your hard work and toil from your experience, don't be easily carried away by other people, you must add your own insight.

comments.author: Saira10
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on May 26, 2023, 12:33:37 PMI know you click on this topic because of the title, the same way those idiots takes advantage of you on Youtube and Twitter, saying they know which projects are best for you. Here is a fact for people like you.If you accept this fact early on, then you will have a more successful journey in the crypto space.You can't just have someone message you with an idea that can change your life, why don't they take advantage of it and get rich first?They want to use you and it's let for you to use your head. I don't see rich people willingly going around telling people how to get rich either, they won't. Let's stop fooling ourselves, everyone is running after something.Be smart because this crypto space is like a wild west, you are on your own, and the only way to find your way is believing in yourself and the knowledge you are acquiring on this forum. Nothing comes without a price, work your way up, if everyone has the poor antidote everyone will be rich, including all your neighbors and friends. It's not easy to get rich and that's why people are taking advantage of people. Work your way UP. Right You've highlighted a crucial truth about the crypto space and life in general. Its essential to be cautious and skeptical of those promising quick riches without any effort. And True success comes from hard work dedication, consistency and acquiring knowledge. By believing in yourself continuously learning and putting in the necessary effort you can navigate the unpredictable nature of the crypto world. I thing its not about shortcuts or relying on others but about empowering yourself to make informed decisions and work your way up towards your goals.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: Zlantann on May 26, 2023, 03:57:17 PMI have never been moved by get-rich-quick enterprise and it has helped me to stay safe from scammers. Nobody will give you wealth just like that because everybody needs more money. Days are gone when people were given Bitcoin freely with little or no effort. Any investment that promises to make you rich fast without effort is likely a scam. Hard work, determination, and sacrifice are key virtues that will lead to durable riches. If the scheme promises to give you a high profit, just be careful and do your own research. Because it is a ponzi scheme if any company offers unreasonably high profits, they will seduce anyone into their trap of course for people who believe in this to be fooled.Getting rich is not as easy as it is said, it all takes hard work and strong determination and our determination in running the business that is running, I have asked several times to people who can say that success starts from the bottom and he said it takes a long time until More than 10 years, so it doesn't make sense if there is a job or investment that offers a get-rich-quick scheme and avoid it because in essence we will be deceived by them.
